project(Turi)

make_library(xgboost
  SOURCES
    src/gbm/gbm.cpp
    src/tree/updater.cpp
    src/io/dmlc_simple.cpp
    src/io/io.cpp
    subtree/rabit/src/engine_empty.cc
  REQUIRES
    libjson
  EXTERNAL_VISIBILITY
  COMPILE_FLAGS_EXTRA
    -DXGBOOST_CUSTOMIZE_MSG_
    -Wno-narrowing
    -msse2
    -funroll-loops
  COMPILE_FLAGS_EXTRA_GCC
    -Wno-comment
    -Wno-pointer-arith
    -Wno-sign-compare
    -Wno-unknown-pragmas
  COMPILE_FLAGS_EXTRA_CLANG
    -Wno-null-arithmetic
  COMPILE_FLAGS_EXTRA
    -Wno-unused-command-line-argument
)
